content:
DbUpdatableDataRecord Class

In this Article

Provides access to the original values of object data. The DbUpdatableDataRecord implements methods that allow updates to the original values of an object.

Syntax

Declaration

public abstract class DbUpdatableDataRecord : System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord, System.Data.IExtendedDataRecord

Inheritance Hierarchy

  • Object
  • System.Data.Common.DbDataRecord
  • DbUpdatableDataRecord

rawMetadata.description: Provides access to the original values of object data. The DbUpdatableDataRecord implements methods that allow updates to the original values of an object.
